description: This file defines a Flutter widget called OceanInput, which is a styled text input field with customizable properties like hint text, keyboard type, obscurity, and change callback.

classes.name: OceanInput
classes.description: A stateless widget that encapsulates a styled TextField with rounded corners and configurable properties.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for OceanInput, returning a configured TextField.
